title: The Complete Guide to Hunting, Butchering, and Cooking Wild Game
description:
HAPPY READING + COOKING! 
https://kat.cr/user/MoodieMimi/

A comprehensive big-game hunting guide for hunters ranging from first-time novices to seasoned experts, with more than 400 full-color photographs, including work by renowned outdoor photographer John Hafner
 
Steven Rinella was raised in a hunting family and has been pursuing wild game his entire life. In this first-ever complete guide to huntingâ€”from hunting an animal to butchering and cooking itâ€”the host of the popular hunting show MeatEater shares his own expertise with us, and imparts strategies and tactics from many of the most experienced hunters in the United States as well.
 
This invaluable book includes
â€¢ recommendations on what equipment you will needâ€”and what you can do withoutâ€”from clothing to cutlery to camping gear to weapons 
â€¢ basic and advanced hunting strategies, including spot-and-stalk hunting, ambush hunting, still hunting, drive hunting, and backpack hunting
â€¢ how to effectively use decoys and calling for big game
â€¢ how to find hunting locations, on both public and private land, and how to locate areas that other hunters arenâ€™t using
â€¢ how and when to scout hunting locations for maximum effectiveness
â€¢ basic information on procuring hunting tags, including limited-entry â€œdrawâ€ tags
â€¢ a species-by-species description of fourteen big-game animals, from their mating rituals and preferred habitats to the best hunting techniquesâ€”both firearm and archeryâ€”for each species
â€¢ how to plan and pack for backcountry hunts
â€¢ instructions on how to break down any big-game animal and transport it from your hunting site
â€¢ how to butcher your own big-game animals and select the proper cuts for sausages, roasts, and steaks, and how to utilize underappreciated cuts such as ribs and shanks
â€¢ cooking techniques and recipes, for both outdoor and indoor preparation of wild game
